Program Providers

Reach More Parents with Digital Flyer Delivery

Peachjar knows how critical programs like yours are in helping children achieve their full potential. Let us help you reach more parents, and together we can ensure all children are set up for success, both now and as adults!

With Peachjar's digital flyer system, district-approved flyers are delivered directly to parents' inboxes and are also posted to each school's website, providing parents with multiple ways to view flyers on the go.

Interested in working with Pillar?

Let's Talk Turkey

Benefits

Ensure flyer delivery to parents, with a quick link to register
Reduce time spent hand delivering flyers to schools
Send multiple pages in your flyer at no extra cost
Track your flyer campaign's performance metrics and ROI

How It Works

2010

Submit your flyer online with a quick and easy upload

16

Your flyer is immediately routed to the flyer approver at each of the selected districts

Over 500

Once approved, your flyer will be emailed to parents and posted to each school's website
